queries.query:
import "date"

from(bucket: "block-bucket")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: -8d, unit: 1d))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "height")
  |> group(columns: ["miner"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: count, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "block-number")

from(bucket: "share-bucket")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "worker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valid_shares")
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 900000000.0}))

import "date"

from(bucket: "share-bucket")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: -25h, unit: 1h), stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "worker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valid_shares")
  |> group(columns: ["miner"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, period: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 3600000000.0}))
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0.0)
  |> yield(name: "24h-hr")

import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"

from(bucket: "block-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block")
  |> drop(columns: ["node"])
  |> v1.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "block-status")

import "date"

from(bucket: "share-bucket")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: -25h, unit: 1h), stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "worker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valid_shares")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 3600000000.0}))
  |> group(columns: ["worker"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "log-bucket")
  |> range(start: -8h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "status")
  |> group(columns: ["pool"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0)
  |> yield(name: "workers-connection")

from(bucket: "share-bucket")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "worker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "valid_shares")
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 86400000000.0}))

spec.description: fi5 mining pool dashboard contains: ckb reward, miner and workers status etc.
spec.name: fi5pool-lite dashboard
